questions.quote: Because I'm REFRESHED. I finally found a way to sleep in my office. Under the desk. I lie on my back. I tuck in the chair. I'm invisible.
So we order lunch, and we're talking. Finally, she blurts out how it's 'not working'.
Could you fill these out for me please? And um, Elaine, you'll be seeing Juliannaâ€¦
Well. You are not gonna believe this. Now Lippman is renounced. This shiksa thing is *totally* out of control. What is *with* you people? What are you looking at?
All right! OK! Right, here we go. Yeah. OK, so... 'For sale. A big, juicy van.' And, ooh, you gotta put down, 'interesting trades considered.'
Oh, gotta get fifty. Gotta get fifty. All right, I tell you what. We go to the coffee shop, you call your manager. Maybe they made an offer.
Lippman want's to see me in his office SEE ME! That can't be good
Oh, right, at the coffee shop. Where did they get the idea that you have a place in the Hamptons?
Vandelay Industries, Kel Varnsen speaking. May we help you? ... Oh Hi Keith. Na, I was just jokin' around
I don't think there's ever been an appointment in my life where I wanted the other guy to show up.  Wait a second, is that him?
